clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of ventricular pre excitation and cardiac dysrhythmias

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Quinidine a hydantoin anticonvulsant is used alone or with phenobarbital or other anticonvulsants to manage tonic clonic seizures psychomotor seizures neuropathic pain syndromes including diabetic neuropathy digitalis induced cardiac arrhythmias and cardiac arrhythmias associated with QT interval prolongation
